attributes.action: Fix his email service, which has been down for over a month, so he can TRULY listen to everyone telling him to GO, GO NOW!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
According to the No 10 Website,

"This service has been temporarily suspended for maintenance work. Don't worry, we are still accepting faxes and letters, and you can still let us know your opinions via an epetition or on our new Twitter service.

We apologise for any inconvenience caused. We hope to be back up and running in a few days.

23 June 2008"


TOO many people telling you to go, so you stop listening, Gord, old bean??

rejection.details:
Please supply full name and address information.

You can write to the PM at the following address:

10 Downing Street,
London,
SW1A 2AA
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
